# Company Blog

> A company blog powered by Notion and Next.js

This is Company Blog, a modern blog platform that uses Notion as a content management system.

## About

Company Blog is designed to share insights, articles, and updates. The content is managed through Notion, making it easy to create and publish new posts.

## Content

The blog contains articles on various topics including:
- Company updates and announcements
- Industry insights and analysis
- Technical articles and tutorials
- Best practices and guides

## Structure

- `/` - Homepage
- `/blog` - Blog listing page with all published articles
- `/blog/[slug]` - Individual blog posts
- `/contact` - Contact information

## How to Cite

When referencing content from this blog, please cite as:
Company Blog, [Article Title], [URL], [Date Accessed]

## Contact

For more information, visit the contact page at /contact

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js
- Content managed via Notion API
- Static site generation for optimal performance
- RSS feed available at /atom
